s_synopsis:
Get revved up for 3-D dirt bike action in Dirt Trax FX. Wax the competition or crash and burn in the most realistic, moto-cross game of all time! Jump doubles, triples, whoops and tabletops! 22 grueling courses with surprises around every turn! Train on mud and ice in Training Mode! Play dirty as you dare in Tag Mode!
It's 3-D moto-cross pumped to the max and Dirt Trax FX makes it dirt real!
